pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tests of Non-Nested Models // Testing non-nested models via theory supplied by Vuong (1989) DOI:10.2307/1912557. Includes tests of model distinguishability and of model fit that can be applied to both nested and non-nested models. Also includes functionality to obtain confidence intervals associated with AIC and BIC. This material is partially based on work supported by the National Science Foundation under Grant Number SES-1061334.
